name: axiom
description: Axiom is a powerful, high performance, modular Hugo theme, designed to make the readers of your content and the search engines happy.
author: Jhaura Wachsman <jw@jhaurawachsman.com> (https://www.jhaurawachsman.com/)

scripts.css: npm run css:type && npm run css:syntaxdark && npm run css:syntaxlight && npm run css:app
scripts.js: npm run js:index && npm run js:app
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run css && npm run js
scripts.prd: NODE_ENV=production npm run css && npm run js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
